profile.description: Multi-spacecraft time-shifted solar wind data propagated to the bow shock nose
data_caveats: Combined from multiple L1 monitors; source spacecraft varies
Some empty-string fill values in CSV; use coerce parsing
analysis_patterns: Geomagnetic coupling: correlate Bz with SYM-H
Solar wind driver identification: speed + density + B for CME/CIR

OMNI_HRO_1MIN.description: 1-minute high-resolution OMNI solar wind and IMF data

parameters.name: IMF
parameters.description: OMNI ID code for the source spacecraft for time-shifted IMF values (see OMNI documentation link for codes)

parameters.name: PLS
parameters.description: OMNI ID code for the source spacecraft  for time-shifted IP plasma values (see OMNI documentation link for codes)

parameters.name: IMF_PTS
parameters.description: Number of fine time scale points in IMF averages

parameters.name: PLS_PTS
parameters.description: Number of fine time scale points in plasma averages

parameters.name: F
parameters.description: Magnitude of avg. field vector (nT) (last currently-available OMNI B-field data Dec 24, 2025)

parameters.name: BY_GSM
parameters.description: By (nT), GSM, determined from post-shift GSE components

parameters.name: BZ_GSM
parameters.description: Bz (nT), GSM, determined from post-shift GSE components

parameters.name: proton_density
parameters.description: Proton density (n/cc) (last currently-available OMNI plasma data Dec 24, 2025)

parameters.name: BSN_x
parameters.description: Bow Shock Nose (Re) location, X, GSE

parameters.name: BSN_y
parameters.description: Bow Shock Nose (Re) location, Y, GSE

parameters.name: BSN_z
parameters.description: Bow Shock Nose (Re) location, Z, GSE

parameters.name: AE_INDEX
parameters.description: AE - 1-minute AE-index, from WDC Kyoto (Final 1988/001-1988/182, Provisional 1990/001-2020/365)

parameters.name: AL_INDEX
parameters.description: AL - 1-minute AL-index, from WDC Kyoto (Final 1988/001-1988/182, Provisional 1990/001-2020/365)

parameters.name: PC_N_INDEX
parameters.description: PC - 1-minute Polar Cap index (North, Qaanaaq geomagnetic observatory), from DTU Space, Technical University of Denmark  (1981/001-2024/365)

parameters.name: IMF
parameters.description: OMNI ID code for the source spacecraft for time-shifted IMF values (see OMNI documentation link for codes)

parameters.name: PLS
parameters.description: OMNI ID code for the source spacecraft for time-shifted IP plasma values (see OMNI documentation link for codes)

parameters.name: IMF_PTS
parameters.description: Number of fine time scale points in IMF averages

parameters.name: PLS_PTS
parameters.description: Number of fine time scale points in plasma averages

parameters.name: F
parameters.description: Magnitude of avg. field vector (nT) (last currently-available OMNI B-field data Dec 24, 2025)

parameters.name: BY_GSM
parameters.description: By (nT), GSM, determined from post-shift GSE components

parameters.name: BZ_GSM
parameters.description: Bz (nT), GSM, determined from post-shift GSE components

parameters.name: proton_density
parameters.description: Proton density (n/cc) (last currently-available OMNI plasma data Dec 24, 2025)

parameters.name: BSN_x
parameters.description: Bow Shock Nose (Re) location, X, GSE

parameters.name: BSN_y
parameters.description: Bow Shock Nose (Re) location, Y, GSE

parameters.name: BSN_z
parameters.description: Bow Shock Nose (Re) location, Z, GSE

parameters.name: AE_INDEX
parameters.description: AE - 5-minute AE-index, from WDC Kyoto (Final 1988/001-1988/182, Provisional 1990/001-2020/365)

parameters.name: AL_INDEX
parameters.description: AL - 5-minute AL-index, from WDC Kyoto (Final 1988/001-1988/182, Provisional 1990/001-2020/365)

parameters.name: PC_N_INDEX
parameters.description: PC - 5-minute Polar Cap index (North, Qaanaaq geomagnetic observatory), from DTU Space, Technical University of Denmark (1981/001-2024/365)

parameters.name: PR-FLX_10
parameters.description: Proton flux >10 MeV (1/(SQcm-ster-s)) (all fluxes from GOES 1986/001-2020/063)

parameters.name: IMF1800
parameters.description: OMNI ID code for the source spacecraft for time-shifted IMF values (see OMNI documentation link for codes) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: PLS1800
parameters.description: OMNI ID code for the source spacecraft for time-shifted IP plasma values (see OMNI documentation link for codes) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: IMF_PTS1800
parameters.description: # fine time scale IMF points (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: PLS_PTS1800
parameters.description: # fine time scale plasma points (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: ABS_B1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP Average B Field Magnitude, nT, (last currently-available OMNI B-field data Dec 24, 2025) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: F1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP Magnitude of average field vector (nT) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: THETA_AV1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP Latitude/Theta of average B vector (deg) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: PHI_AV1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP Longitude/Phi of average B vector (deg) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: SIGMA-ABS_B1800
parameters.description: RMS deviation of average B magnitude (nT) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: SIGMA-B1800
parameters.description: RMS deviation of magnitude of the average vector field (nT) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: T1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP Plasma Temperature, deg K, (last currently-available OMNI plasma data Jan 07, 2026) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: N1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP Ion number density (per cc) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: PHI-V1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP plasma flow direction longitude (deg),  phi (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: THETA-V1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP plasma flow direction latitude (deg), theta (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: SIGMA-T1800
parameters.description: RMS deviation of plasma temperature (deg k) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: SIGMA-N1800
parameters.description: RMS deviation of ion number density (per cc) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: SIGMA-V1800
parameters.description: RMS deviation in plasma flow velocity (km/s) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: SIGMA-PHI-V1800
parameters.description: RMS deviation in plasma flow  direction longitude (deg), phi (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: SIGMA-THETA-V1800
parameters.description: RMS deviation in plasma flow direction latitude (deg), theta (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: PR-FLX_11800
parameters.description: 1AU Proton flux > 1 MeV, 1/(SQcm-ster-s), (last currently-available OMNI proton fluxes Mar 04, 2020) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: MFLX1800
parameters.description: Magnetospheric Contamination of 1AU Proton Flux code (6=No,<=5 see OMNI documentation) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: R1800
parameters.description: Daily sunspot number V2, from  http://sidc.oma.be/silso/datafiles/ (1963/001-2025/334) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: F10_INDEX1800
parameters.description: F10.7 - Daily 10.7 cm solar radio flux, units: 10**(-22) Joules/second/square-meter/Hertz, from NGDC (1963/001-2026/012), (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: KP1800
parameters.description: Kp - 3-hour Kp*10 (Kp=1-,1,1+ corresponds to 7,10,13), fromNGDC (1963/001-2026/012) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: DST1800
parameters.description: Dst - 1-hour Dst index (1963/001-2014/366), Provisional Dst (2021/001-2025/181), Quick-look Dst (2025/182-2026/012), from WDC Kyoto (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: AE1800
parameters.description: AE - 1-hour AE-index,from WDC Kyoto (1963/001-1988/182), Provisional (1990/001-2020/365), from WDC Kyoto (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: AL_INDEX1800
parameters.description: AL - 1-hour AL-index, from WDC Kyoto (1963/001-1988/182), Provisional (1990/001-2018/059), from WDC Kyoto (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: AU_INDEX1800
parameters.description: AU - 1-hour AU-index,from WDC Kyoto (1963/001-1988/182), Provisional (1990/001-2018/059), from WDC Kyoto (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: PC_N_INDEX1800
parameters.description: PC - 1-hour Polar Cap index (North, Thule station), from NGDC (Final 1975/001-2024/365) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: Proton_QI1800
parameters.description: Solar wind (magnetic energy density)/(kinetic energy density) (half-hour midpoint)
